dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5906 IH: Medicaid Accountability Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Sablan (for himself, Mr. Moylan, Ms. Plaskett, and Mrs. Radewagen) introduced the following bill
Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend title XI of the Social Security Act to exclude expenditures attributable to a State medicaid fraud control unit from the payment limits under Medicaid for Guam, the Northern Mariana Islands, and American Samoa.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Medicaid Accountability Act of 2023.

section.header: Exclusion of expenditures attributable to State medicaid fraud control unit from payment limits
section.text: Section 1108(g)(4)(A) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1308(g)(4)(A)) is amended by inserting and with respect to fiscal years beginning on or after the date of the enactment of the Medicaid Accountability Act of 2023, if Guam, the Northern Mariana Islands, or American Samoa qualify for a payment under section 1903(a)(6) for a calendar quarter of such fiscal year, before the payment shall not be taken into account.
